title: ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for 47 Professor, Associate Professor Posts
description: The Employees' State Insurance Corporation Haryana (ESIC Haryana) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 47Â Professor, Associate Professor, and Assistant Professor Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, MD/MS can apply for the ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mention...
